@notice Refund `msg.sender` in the case the Token Creation did
 not reach its minimum fueling goal

@return divisor The divisor used to calculate the token creation rate during
 the creation phase

params._owner: The address of the account owning tokens
params._spender: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens

returns.remaining: Amount of remaining tokens of _owner that _spender is allowed to spend

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be approved for transfer
params._spender: The address of the account able to transfer the tokens

returns.success: Whether the approval was successful or not

params._owner: The address from which the balance will be retrieved

params._tokenHolder: The address of the Tokens's recipient

returns.success: Whether the token creation was successful

returns.divisor: The divisor used to calculate the token creation rate during the creation phase

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred

returns.success: Whether the transfer was successful or not

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred
params._from: The address of the origin of the transfer

returns.success: Whether the transfer was successful or not

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred
params._from: The address of the origin of the transfer

returns.success: Whether the transfer was successful or not

params._amount: The amount of tokens to be transferred

returns.success: Whether the transfer was successful or not

approve(address,uint256).notice: `msg.sender` approves `_spender` to spend `_amount` tokens on its behalf

approveAndCall(address,uint256,bytes).notice: Allow another contract to spend some tokens in your behalf

createTokenProxy(address).notice: Create Token with `_tokenHolder` as the initial owner of the Token

name().notice: Public variables of the token, all used for display

refund().notice: Refund `msg.sender` in the case the Token Creation did not reach its minimum fueling goal

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Send `_amount` tokens to `_to` from `_from` on the condition it is approved by `_from`

transferFrom_2(address,address,uint256).notice: Send `_amount` tokens to `_to` from `_from` on the condition it is approved by `_from`
